keys: Biología. El estudio de la vida. Hoja de trabajo

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4312</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What's in a Hedge -- Worksheet</string>
            <string language="es">What's in a Hedge – Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Céard ata sa Sceach – Bileog Oibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was in einer Hecke -- Bogen ist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui est dans une haie -- tableau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O que está em um hedge -- folha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è in una barriera -- foglio di lavoro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι σε έναν φράκτη -- φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Student worksheet for use with the video, "Whats in a Hedge", produced by the Irish Science Teachers' Association.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo para que la usen los estudiantes con el video “Whats in a Hedge”, producido por la Irish Science Teachers' Association.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre dalta le húsáid leis an bhfíseán, “Céard atá sa Sceach” a léirigh Cumann Eol-oidí na hÉireann.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
            <string language="es">Biología. El estudio de la vida. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Bitheolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">The Study of Life</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar ar Bheatha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmerbogen für Gebrauch mit dem 
Bildschirm, "was in einer Hecke" ist, produziert durch die irischen 
Verbindung der Wissenschaft Lehrer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau d'étudiant pour l'usage avec le vidéo, 
"ce qui est dans une haie", produit par l'association des professeurs 
irlandais de la Science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha do estudante para o uso com o vídeo, "o 
que está em um hedge", produzido pela associação dos professores 
irish da ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro dell'allievo per uso con il 
video, "che cosa è in una barriera", prodotto dall'associazione degli
insegnanti irlandesi di scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας σπουδαστών για τη χρήση με το βίντεο, 
"Whats σε έναν φράκτη", παραχθείς από την ένωση των 
ιρλανδικών καθηγητών θετικών επιστημών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Studie des Lebens</string>
          </keyword>
